DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate effectiveness cost-effectiveness cognitive behavioral weight management program , complement interactive Web site brief telephone coaching , implement among TRICARE non-active-duty beneficiary . A total 1,755 participant four Midwestern state randomize one three randomize control trial group increase intervention intensity : mail material basic Web access ( RCT1 ) , plus interactive Web site ( RCT2 ) , plus brief phone- Web-based coach support health lifestyle coach ( RCT3 ) . The study assess change participant ' weight , blood pressure , diet , physical activity baseline 6 , 12 , 15 18 month . Analyses estimate overall cost saving calculate cost-effectiveness ratio randomize control trial compare `` do-nothing '' alternative cost per quality-adjusted life year .
DOC.detailed_description: Lifestyle modification intervention promote healthful eating habit physical activity effective produce weight loss 4 % 9 % initial bodyweight . If maintain , level weight loss reduce hypertension , high blood glucose , elevate lipid . However , weight loss often plateau 6 month , weight regain begin 12 month . Accordingly , interest intervention , Web-based reinforcement brief counsel maintain weight loss time relative cost-effectiveness program delivery mode . Most obesity treatment program focus outcome individual without assess population-based cost saving . This study suggest broad perspective help identify benefit weight management adult population . Accordingly , study assess cost-effectiveness weight management program population adult serve large health care systemâ€”the TRICARE Management Activity ( TMA ) , agency manages TRICARE health care benefit active-duty service member , retired service member , family , National Guard/Reserve member , family . The annual direct medical cost overweight/obesity beneficiary enrol TRICARE Prime estimate exceed $ 1.1 billion . This study investigate effectiveness cost-effectiveness method deliver cognitive-behavioral weight loss intervention .
DOC.criteria: TRICARE Prime nonactiveduty beneficiary Body Mass Index 25 50 Living 4 midwestern state ( TRICARE region ) Not able engage physical activity Pregnant Body mass index great 50 Body mass index less 25 Human immunodeficiency virus infect current cancer
